title: Wall Street Warns of a Deepening Oil Glut in 2026
summary: Oversupplied markets will keep oil prices under pressure next year, and the U.S. benchmark will average below $60 per barrel, the monthly Reuters poll of analysts and economists showed on Friday. title: Petrobras Cuts Capex Plan on Lower Oil Prices
summary: Brazil’s energy major Petrobras has revised its spending plans for the next five years, prompted by the steady and persistent decline in oil prices.
